item.description:
We need your VOICE & your VOTE!

Â 

Please join us at the Capitol on Tuesday, May 21st, from 11a-1p as we stand together to demand our right to know what is in our food. Please meet on the north side of the Capitol building (the side facing Bushnell Park) at 11:00am. We will join together to send a strong message to our legislators that we want the right to know what is in our food now.

After the rally, we will be joined by legislators for a GMO free food tasting. There will be delicious food thanks to our generous CT farms, chefs and businesses (we will publish the list once it is complete). This is also a perfect opportunity to meet legislators face to face and ask them to support HB 6519 and HB 6527. We will provide you with handouts.

We need you to be there and to bring your friends. Please share this on facebook, twitter and forward to your contacts.

Thank you for all you are doing to ensure that GMO labeling in CT will become a reality.

Learn more about GMO Free CT on our web site:
http://www.GMOFreeCT.org/
https://www.facebook.com/events/184394268379674/
item.how_to_find_us: With only 5 weeks left of the legislative session, we are in the home stretch. Please join us at the Capitol on Tuesday, May 21st, from 11a-1p as we stand together to demand our right to know what is in our food.
item.name: RALLY AND GMO FREE FOOD TASTING
